Dashboard.title: Welcome
Dashboard.description: This is where you can seamlessly access and configure building blocks to enhance your public sector departmentâ€™s efficiency and functionality.
Dashboard.tilesLabel: Click on one of the icons below to begin.

AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <url>feedback</url> will help us to improve it.

main.title: Building Blocks
main.subtitle: Build and run online services easily
main.description: Building Blocks are reusable, compatible software parts. They include messaging, digital forms, online payments, case management, and a design system that unites them all with a familiar look and feel.
main.secondaryP1: Your users can complete a form, send you information, make secure payments and receive notifications with Building Blocks. It's low-cost, easy to set up and has accessibility built in from the start.
main.secondaryP2: Government departments can use any number of these Building Blocks to create solutions that meet people's needs.

payments.title: Payments
payments.description: Our payments block is built on a robust infrastructure that enables secure and efficient financial transactions, giving users peace of mind every time they use it.

messaging.title: Messaging
messaging.description: The Messaging Building Block is a communication solution tailored to streamline interactions with the public.

designSystem.title: Design System
designSystem.description: Streamline your design process and ensure consistency across your digital services with the gov.ie Design System.
designSystem.cta: Learn more about the Design System

forms.title: FormsIE
forms.description: Enhance your unit's operations with FormsIE, a digital solution for online forms that is user-friendly, efficient and accessible.

advantages.title: Why use Building Blocks
advantages.description: Building Blocks are created by the Digital Services Unit (DSU).

noProcurement.title: No procurement
noProcurement.description: As a government-owned product, there is no need for a lengthy wait procuring external suppliers.

noCode.title: No code
noCode.description: All our tools can be implemented with no technical knowledge.

lowCost.title: Low cost
lowCost.description: Our tools are competitively priced when compared with other software on the market.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: All our tools are fully accessible for both civil servants and end users and comply with the EU Web Accessibility Directive.

trustedExperience.title: Trusted experience
trustedExperience.description: Put your users at ease with a government-branded look and feel and a familiar gov.ie design system.

test.title: Test before you launch
test.description: Quickly test early versions of your service before you build it, saving time and money and reducing risk.

footer.title: The Building Blocks
footer.listItem2: send and receive notifications and information
footer.descriptionP1: It's low cost, easy to set up and has accessibility baked in from the start.
footer.descriptionP2: You can use one, some or all of the Building Blocks to support the service that you offer.

AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <anchor>feedback</anchor> will help us to improve it.

main.title: Messaging
main.description: Messaging Building Block uses the electronic postbox embedded within systems, so people can access their messages in one place.
main.listDescription: Messaging Building Block allows you to:
main.listItem1: send email and text messages across various channels

section1.title: Centralised platform
section1.description: Contact the public through their chosen method of communication - whether that's email, text message or through the electronic postbox.

section2.title: Secure
section2.description: Messaging Building Block prioritises security to safeguard sensitive information and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.

section3.title: Reusable Templates
section3.description: Easily create templates for any type of communication (for example, confirmations, reminders and success notifications). This will ensure consistency and streamline your processes.

section4.title: Electronic Postbox
section4.description: Embedded within other systems, the electronic postbox allows users to easily access their messages and take action.

section5.title: Accessibility Compliance
section5.description: Messaging Building Block meets with accessibility regulations, Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, ensuring that all users can access and interact with messages.

section6.title: Dedicated Support
section6.description: Our team of experts is here to assist you every step of the way. Whether you have technical questions or need assistance with implementation, the dedicated support team ensures a smooth experience.

getStarted.title: Get started
getStarted.description: Ready to elevate your communication strategy? Contact us to schedule a demo and see how Messaging Building Block can transform how you engage with the public.

AlphaBanner.bannerText: This is a new service - your <anchor>feedback</anchor> will help us to improve it.

main.title: Payments
main.description: Our Payments Building Block is built on a robust infrastructure that enables secure and efficient financial transactions, giving users peace of mind every time they use it.

integration.title: Seamless Integration
integration.description: The Payments Building Block seamlessly connects with multiple payment methods, including credit cards, digital wallets, and bank transfers, to offer flexibility to your users.

security.title: Enhanced Security
security.description: The Payments Building Block employs encryption protocols and payment providers that are Payment Card Industry (PCI) compliant, giving you peace of mind.

interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
interface.description: The Payments Building Block has an intuitive interface that makes payment processing simple for both administrators and users. Whether you're generating payment requests or tracking transactions, it's quick and simple.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: The Payments Building Block is designed with accessibility in mind. It conforms with the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, ensuring that all users can easily access the service.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.description: Our team of experts is here to assist you every step of the way. Whether you have technical questions or need assistance with implementation, you can rely on the Payments Building Block's dedicated support team.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to transform your payment processes? Contact us to schedule a demo or to learn more about how Payments Building Block can empower your public sector department.
